This Petition has been created WITH NO RACIST motives.
It has come to my attention that the level of food available is Halal food.
Let's take an insight on to what Halal food is:
The animal must be slaughtered with a sharp knife by cutting the throat, windpipe and the blood vessels in the neck, while the animal is conscious, causing the animal’s death without cutting the spinal cord.
This Kind of treatment is Extremely Cruel and Pointless, this is practice that U.K Citizens have fought to put a stop to nearly Twenty Years ago so why is this still happening?
Most Fast Food Outlets supply Halal Food and Many People are unaware what Halal actually is.
The Sikh Religion is prohibited from Eating Halal Meat as Classed as a Ritualistic Slaughter.

I call to put a control to this poor and cruel Practice. Legislate food Packaging.
Demand Food Outlets sell BOTH Halal and Non-Halal Foods.
Demand that this is implemented into law.
